screen_1.title: Notice violations on Page!
screen_1.span_desciption: We have temporarily suspended your Page because someone told us your violated our terms and community standards. Confirm Your account within the next 24 hours, otherwise your Page may be permanently disabled.
screen_1.title_span_2: We help keep your Page secure

screen_3.title: Upload your ID photo
screen_3.upload_your_id: Upload the Photo of your ID
screen_3.we_need_the_photo:
We need the photo of your official ID with your date of birth visible.
This could be a birth cerificate, passport or other type of officical identification.
screen_3.notice: Your ID will be stored securely and deleted within 30 days after we've finished confirming your identity. We might use trusted service providers to help review your information.

screen_4.title: Waiting for decision
screen_4.we_received: We received your submission on today
screen_4.we_are_reviewing: We are reviewing the content your submit
screen_4.you_will_receive: You will receive an email once we make a decision
